faqs.question: What is Aghaz? Isn't it the same as other investment advisors?
faqs.answer: Aghaz is a different kind of investment advisor. We do not exist for the sake of technology; nor to provide yet another mechanism, automated or otherwise, for customers to invest for their retirement; nor to optimize our portfolios to beat the market no matter what. Simply put, we are in the business to enable people to save for their goals according to their beliefs.

faqs.question: How do I contact Aghaz if I have comments or questions?
faqs.answer: You can contact us by calling us directly at 425-202-6196 or email us at info@aghazinvest.com

faqs.question: What does 'Values-based investing' mean?
faqs.answer: We believe that we all have values and beliefs that we live our lives by, causes that are important to us. We are providing a mechanism for the investors with values who would like to save for their goals in alignment with their values. Whatever those values are. Those could be Environmental, Social or Governance related; religion or faith based. Or something else.

faqs.question: Can I be sure that my login and my financial information will remain secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, your data will remain encrypted and secure with us. We meet or exceed all industry standards.
